sections.PURPOSE: Ensure Soldiers can effectively engage targets ranging from 400m to 1400m.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Leader’s recon of range and construction of range packet
Issue OPORD and disseminate info to 3/2 leadership
Conduct Zero and fire alternate positions
sections.END STATE:
SMs are proficient and qualified on each sniper weapon systems. Concept of the Operation:
Phase I (Preparation): Starts with leader’s recon; ends with range occupation.
Phase II (
sections.EXECUTION: ): Starts with range occupation NLT 080730MAR21 and ends o/a 091600MAR21 when all Soldiers have successfully completed all training events (range will go dry immediately after). Critical
sections.TASKS:
Engage Targets with an M107 and M2010 TC 3-22.10
Zero an M107, M2010 TC 3-22.10
Load an M107, M2010 TC 3-22.10
Main Events
Confirm Zero/Truing Weapons
M107 Qualification
Concurrent Training:
1.) Observe Shooting while not firing IOT practice wind calls and corrections
sections.COMMAND & SIGNAL:
PACE: Landline, Radio, Cell Phone, Hand and Arm signal
Supporting Collective

8. Retrain/Retry
